    @Deprecated
public interface DataBrokerService
extends BrokerService, DataReader<org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.data.api.YangInstanceIdentifier,org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.data.api.CompositeNode>, DataModificationTransactionFactory<org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.data.api.YangInstanceIdentifier,org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.data.api.CompositeNode>, DataChangePublisher<org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.data.api.YangInstanceIdentifier,org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.data.api.CompositeNode,DataChangeListener>
    DataBrokerService provides unified access to the data stores available in the system.
